text: alt=Cyle Larin dribbling a soccer ball. Freddy Adu, was the first overall draft pick in 2004. Steve Zakuani, was the first overall draft pick in 2009. Andrew Wenger, was the first overall draft pick in 2012. Abu Danladi, drafted out of UCLA, was the first overall draft pick in 2017. The Major League Soccer SuperDraft's first overall pick is the player who is selected first among all eligible draftees by a team during the annual Major League Soccer (MLS) SuperDraft. The first pick is awarded to the club with the poorest regular season record during the previous MLS campaign. Exceptions are when there is an expansion franchise, where they expansion side has the opportunity to select the first overall draft pick. Two first picks have won the MLS Rookie of the Year award in their maiden season: Maurice Edu and Cyle Larin. No first pick has ever won the Landon Donovan MVP Award, although Alecko Eskandarian is the only first draft pick to win the MLS Cup Most Valuable Player Award. Note that between 1996 and 1999, the MLS draft was known as the MLS College Draft. Official MLS publications include the College Draft as part of MLS's draft history. ==Key== {| class="wikitable" |- |style="background-color:#CCFFCC; width:6em"|^ |Denotes players who have been selected to the All-Star Game or MLS Best XI |- |style="background-color:#FFFF99; width:6em"|* |Elected to the National Soccer Hall of Fame |- |style="background-color:#FFE6BD; width:6em"|^* |Denotes Hall of Famers who have been selected to the All-Star Game |- |Player (in italic text) |Rookie of the Year |- |App. |MLS appearances |- |Goals |MLS goals |- |Asst. |MLS assists |- |} ==List of first overall picks== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" summary="Draft (sortable), Selected by (sortable), Player (sortable), Nationality (sortable), College/high school/former club (sortable), PPG (sortable), RPG (sortable), APG (sortable) and References" |- style="background-color:#c5c5c5" !rowspan=2 scope="col"|Draft !rowspan=2 scope="col" width=150|Selected by !rowspan=2 scope="col" width=125|Player !rowspan=2 scope="col"|Nationality !rowspan=2 scope="col"|Position !rowspan=2 scope="col" width=225|College/high school/former club !colspan=3|MLS rookie statistics !rowspan=2 scope="col" class="unsortable"|Ref. |- !scope="col"|App. !scope="col"|Goals !scope="col"|Asst. |- |1996 |Kansas City Wiz !scope="row" style="background- color:transparent;"| | |align=center|DF |Saint Louis |align=center| |align=center| |align=center| |align=center| |- |1997 |Colorado Rapids !scope="row" style="background-color:transparent;"| | |align=center|DF |UCLA |align=center| |align=center| |align=center| |align=center| |- |1998 |Miami Fusion !scope="row" style="background-color:transparent;"| | |align=center|DF |Maryland |align=center| |align=center| |align=center| |align=center| |- |1999 |D.C.
